items.title: ANDALUS
items.text: Applied Nuclear Data Assimilation using Least sqUareS (ANDALUS) is an Open Source data assimilation tool for improving predictions of nuclear applications.

items.title: Getting started
items.text:
• Installation - how to install ANDALUS
  • Usage - how to use ANDALUS
  • API Reference - auto-generated API documentation

items.title: Stable release
items.text:
To install ANDALUS, run this command in your terminal:

uv add andalus

Or if you prefer to use pip:

pip install andalus

items.title: From source
items.text:
The source files for ANDALUS can be downloaded from the Github repo.

You can either clone the public repository:

git clone https://github.com/daan1392/andalus

Or download the tarball:

curl -OJL https://github.com/daan1392/andalus/tarball/main

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

cd andalus
uv sync

items.title: Usage
items.text:
To use ANDALUS in a project:

import andalus
